meta.title: About Aquadecor | Handcrafted Aquarium Backgrounds Since 2004
meta.description: Discover the story behind Aquadecor. For over 20 years, we've been creating the world's most realistic 3D aquarium backgrounds, handcrafted in Serbia and shipped worldwide.

hero.title: Nature-Inspired Aquascapers Since 2004
hero.subtitle: We are Aquadecor, a Serbia-based company that creates unique, handmade 3D backgrounds for aquariums. For over 20 years, we've perfected the art of bringing nature into your fish tank.

story.title: Only Nature Can Copy Us
story.paragraph1: Our story started in a 9m² shed in Serbia. Founder Florian Kovac spent hours perfecting his craft, creating the first 3D aquarium backgrounds by hand. He knew from the start this was something special.
story.paragraph2: "I would spend hours looking at the result of my work," Florian recalls. "Bit by bit, the whole picture started to show up. My favorite part is the final details—the cherry on top. Painting affects the final look substantially, and you can change the appearance of a 3D background easily."
story.paragraph3: What started as a local Serbian operation in 2004 has grown into a worldwide brand. Today, 95% of our products ship internationally. We've designed over 1,000 unique models and served 50,000+ customers across 50+ countries.

quote.text: Every background is hand-sculpted and painted. We study how algae would naturally grow, how light plays across rock formations, how roots intertwine. The goal isn't perfection; it's authenticity.

family.title: Two Companies. One Vision.
family.subtitle: DecorGroup consists of AquaDecor and TerraDecor, both dedicated to bringing nature into your space with unmatched craftsmanship.

aquadecor.name: AquaDecor
aquadecor.description: Over 70 models of custom-made aquarium backgrounds and decorations. From Malawi rock formations to Amazonian root systems, every piece is unique and inspired by natural habitats.

terradecor.name: TerraDecor
terradecor.description: Founded shortly after AquaDecor's success, TerraDecor brings the same meticulous craftsmanship to terrarium interiors and architectural decoration projects.

team.title: Dedicated Craftspeople
team.description: Our team works daily to perfect new models, paying attention to the tiniest details—shapes, colors, natural textures, even how algae would naturally grow. Every background undergoes rigorous quality control and disinfection before being carefully packaged and shipped from our distribution center.

family.trademark: All AquaDecor products and production processes are patented. Our name is a registered trademark in the EU, USA, and many other countries.
